bibl.title: Berenike 1996. Report of the 1996 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert.
bibl.note: tabl., diagrammes, fac-sim., figg., cartes et 2 plans h. t.

Excavations and survey conducted by the University of Delaware and Leiden University, December 1995 - March 1996. - Pp. 193-198: Greek and Latin Textual Material, by A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT: 1. Greek Inscription. Dedication to Caracalla cum suis by an archer from Palmyra, 8 September 215 A.D.; - 2. Fragment of a Greek ostracon, mid-second century A.D.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E. and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1996. Report of the 1996 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert. (CNWS Publications. Special Series. 3.)
Leiden, Research School CNWS, 1998, 8°, vii-477 pp., tabl., diagrammes, fac-sim., figg., cartes et 2 plans h. t. ISBN 90-5789-001-1. Hfl. 90.

Excavations and survey conducted by the University of Delaware and Leiden University, December 1995 - March 1996. - Pp. 193-198: Greek and Latin Textual Material, by A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT: 1. Greek Inscription. Dedication to Caracalla cum suis by an archer from Palmyra, 8 September 215 A.D.; - 2. Fragment of a Greek ostracon, mid-second century A.D.
C.R. par Valerie Maxfield, JRA 13 (2000) pp. 698-702 [concerne aussi: Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1994 (Leiden, 1995); - Berenike 1995 (Leiden, 1996)].
